title: Bacterial and parasitic STDs ‹‹ SEE ALSO 224–225 Sex 230–231 Safer sex If someone has a sexually transmitted disease (STD), also ‹ 232–233 Contraception known as a sexually transmitted infection (STI), it can be spread Viral STDs 236–237 › by vaginal, oral, or anal sex.
